name: Hentai Pair
description:
Gameplay:
Remember the symbols, opening part by part the full picture.
Characteristics:
10 levels
 10 uncensored artworks
Relaxing soundtrack
 HD art gallery
94 achievements
 Clear level button
Commands:
Press "esc" to level select and/or quit
 Press "m" to mute/unmute sound
* Click on the "gear" for more options
Trading Cards:
Soon as possible!
